text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; fill: white; text-anchor: middle;

svg.text: Suite of protocols for securing IP communications through authentication and encryption

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;
font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;
font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;

svg.text: • Defines security policies for IP traffic

font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 10px; fill: white;

svg.text: Linux: ip xfrm policy add src 10.0.0.0/24 dst 192.168.1.0/24 dir out

text.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 10px; fill: white;

svg.text: Windows: netsh ipsec static add policy name="VPN_Policy"

text.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 10px; fill: white;

svg.text: IPsec provides network-layer security for IP communications and is the foundation of many VPN solutions
